results.title: Report a missed bin – The City of Edinburgh Council
results.snippet: Report it and leave your bin out for collection. We'll come back within two working days. You no longer have to use your mygovscot myaccount.

results.title: Report a missed bin
results.snippet: Enter your reference number. This will be the reference number you were given when you saved this form.

selected_links.title: Report a missed bin – The City of Edinburgh Council
strengths: Direct link for reporting missed bin collections
selected_links.reasoning: This link directly leads to a page where residents of Edinburgh can report a missed bin collection, which aligns with the user's information need.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.answer_quality: The content partially answers this need, providing steps for how to report a missed bin, but does not explicitly address the case of forgetting to put the bin out.
Reason.reasoning: The content advises the reader to check if there are delays to kerbside collections and mentions that the bin was on the kerbside from 6am until 10pm, your bin will not be classed as missed until after 10 pm on your scheduled. However, it does not explicitly address forgetting to put the bin out.
Reason.next_actions: Contact the council directly or follow up with additional resources related to reporting a missed bin when forgetting to put it out initially.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content meets some of the needs but does not fully address the concern of a resident who forgot to put their bin out. The content is clear and easy to follow, but lacks explicit guidance for instances where residents forget to put bins out on time.
